messages.message: [Prod, Build] Hey team, I'm getting this message after classifying my docs in my project. I don't have any docs I want to use split classification for here. What triggers this pop-up? Or do we now get this warning on every project?
@Hamish we had concerns that users wouldn’t be able to discover split classification so we prompt the user to decide when classifying for the first time if their files have more than one page

Thanks @Arjun! Is split-classification in Prod now and available GA? Not sure where the setting will be located but feel it would make sense for it to be beside the object detection setting when a new project is created

@Hamish it will ga with the prod push next week. We don’t have plans to change where the setting is located currently. (You can still toggle it by clicking the project settings button, this dialog is just a way to increase discoverability)
